title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. This is one of the beauties of such a versatile ebike kit : the ability to Re-programme the settings to configures one's own personal preferences.Motor Fine-tuning : Riders own preferences for power, speed , pedal assist ( each of the 9 levels of PAS may be adjusted ) . Via a programming tool to suit each riders style and preferences.Motor swap : Swap out and upgrade or downsize motors as required and as your needs change.Choice of 3 Motors: Choose the motor for your SPRINGBOK that best suits you:A) Truck Run 250w Mid DriveTorque 70nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 25-28 km/h.If you are under 90 kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(B) Bafang BBS02B 500w Mid DriveTorque 85nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 32km/h.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences.If you are under 110kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(C) Bafang BBSHD 1000w M615 Mid drive.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences160nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS) . Average speed 45km/h.Freedom to ride at wider range of levels of power low ~ high.If you are under 160kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance even on the steepest of hills*

title: Silverback Slider 1 (Large) 2014 Dual Suspension Mountain Bike
text:
A fun do-it-all trail bike with strong components and wide gearing range due to the 3x setup. I've had this bike for many years and it's equally capable of doing short trail rides and multi-day jeep track adventures – just switch out the tyres to match the ride. 

Just had a minor service to prepare for the next owner. A number of scratches and scrapes, but nothing unexpected, and no damage to frame or components. Rear wheel was recently rebuilt and the bike has a brand new bottom bracket. Fork and shock will need a service at some point, but it's ready to ride as is (once you attach your own pedals).

Shimano XT and SLX all round. Stan's Flow EX rims are beastly trail hoops. Front tyre is pretty much brand new, and rear still has plenty life in it. No pedals.

title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text:
Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)

I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. 
Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.


I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)

This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.

Included are some extras:
E*thirteen valves for tubeless setup
Factory ODI AG signature grips
Extra E*thirteen crank shoes
ODI race number board
Crank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)
AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarm
and the owners manuals.

Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.

Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.

Cheers, Marten

title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. title: ADO A20F XE Fat Tire E-bike - 250W Foldable
text:
ADO 20F XE electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system - The latest XE model
Shimano 7-speed TransmissionADO 20F XE  electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system, it can effectively solve the problems customers encounter on hills, snow and other difficult roads. Give customers a smooth sporting experience!
Front fork suspension to overcome rough and bumpy road conditions The front fork is with spring absorber ,which effectively absorbs the ground impact and brings sensitive response and smooth operation to the rider.
20X4.0 Fat TyreFolding electric bike looks much like any other foldable mountain bike, but with some extra style and those 20×4.0 CST fat tires have an attitude.
It combines the best of both foldable bikes and mountain bikes you can get.
Overall size : 1740*530*1200 mm
After folding: 980*450*770 mm
Net Weight: 30kgG-Driver 2.0 Control SystemADO’s updated G-Driver controller is the solution to gear automation. It offers excellent real-time performance and responds seamlessly to user input.


250w Powerful MotorThis 20-inch fat-tire electric bike packs some awesome power in the form of a massive 250-watt rear hub motor that works with a 36V 10.4Ah battery for a maximum speed of 25 miles per hour. The high-speed motor allows you to cross any terrain with ease.

title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee
